songs.title: We Are Young
songs.lyrics:
Jesy:
Tonight (All: We are young)
Jade:
So let's set the world on (All: Fire)
Perrie:
We can burn (All: Brighter than the sun)

Perrie:
Give me a second, I
I need to get my story straight
My friends are in the bathroom
Getting higher than the Empire State
My lover he is waiting for me
Just across the bar
My seat's been taken by some sunglasses
Asking 'bout a scar and

Leigh-Anne:
I know I gave it to you months ago
I know you're trying to forget
But between the drinks and subtle things
The holes in my apologies
I'm trying hard to take it back

Jesy:
So if by the time the bar closes
And you feel like falling down
I'll carry you home

All:
Tonight, we are young
So let's set the world on fire
We can burn brighter than the sun
Tonight, we are young
So let's set the world on fire
We can burn brighter than the sun

Jade:
Now I know that I'm not all that you got
I guess that I (All: I just thought!)
Maybe we could find new ways to fall apart
But now our friends are back
So let's raise a cup
'Cause I found someone to carry me home

All:
Tonight (Jade: Tonight, tonight)
We are young (Jade: We are young)
So let's set the world on fire
We can burn brighter than the sun
Tonight, we are young
So let's set the world on fire
We can burn brighter than the sun

Jesy:
Nana nananana nana nananana nana nananana nana

Leigh-Anne:
Carry me home tonight (Jesy: Nananana nana nananana nana)
Carry me home tonight (Jesy: Nananana nana nananana nana)

Leigh-Anne & Jade:
Carry me home tonight (Jesy: Nananana nana nananana nana)
Carry me home tonight (Jesy: Nananana nana nananana nana)

Perrie:
The world is on our side (Leigh-Anne & Jade: Carry me home tonight)
(Jesy: Nananana nana nananana nana)
Perrie:
We have no reason to run (Leigh-Anne and Jade: Carry me home tonight)
(Jesy: Nananana nana nananana nana)
Perrie:
So will someone come and carry me home?

All:
Tonight, we are young
So let's set the world on fire
We can burn brighter than the sun
Tonight, we are young (Perrie: Tonight, tonight)
So let's set the world on fire
We can burn brighter than the sun

Jesy:
So if by the time the bar closes
And you feel like falling down
I'll carry you home (All: Tonight)
